dialogs_chapter_5_Рикард покинул Чистили:
Ricard has left Purgatory. He went to the southern
region of the canyon, where there is a surviving 
detachment of combat reapers.
dialogs_chapter_5_У меня есть одна прось: I have one request for you, Laurita.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хочешь, чтобы я его ос: Do you want me to stop him?
dialogs_chapter_5_Постарайся добраться д:
Try to get to the squad before Ricard and
take all the combat reapers under your command.
dialogs_chapter_5_Так же там будет много:
There will also be many wounded there,
Commander Rita's group will take care of them.
dialogs_chapter_5_С тобой пойдет один из:
One of my best scouts, Kenchiru, 
will go with you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Он будет докладывать о:
He will report everything that happens
around Rick.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты серьезно хочешь изб: Do you seriously want to get rid of Ricard?
dialogs_chapter_5_Пусть он и чудной, но:
Even if he is weird, his sword has killed a lot of
dangerous enemies.
dialogs_chapter_5_Даже если у тебя выйде:
Even if you manage to dig up convincing 
compromising evidence against him\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Госпожа не отдаст прик: The lady will not give the order to kill him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Скажи, почему ты так с: Tell me why do you hate him so much?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я думала, это из-за ха:
I thought it was because of Ricard's character, his
mockery\..\..\.. but it's definitely something else.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда останешься с ним:
When you are alone with him, you will see
what he really is.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо, буду осторожна: Okay, I'll be careful with him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если встречу Риома, чт: If I meet Riom, what should I tell him?
dialogs_chapter_5_Мы с матерью любим его:
My mother and I love him and pray that he
got out alive and healthy.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если у вас с Риомом вс:
If things work out extremely well with you and 
Riom, the doors in my house are always open
for you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Эх-х, Риомка, не стоит:
Eh, Riomka, you shouldn't put the sword into 
the first scabbard you come across.
dialogs_chapter_5_Надеюсь, Лаурита единс:
I hope Laurita is the only one, otherwise,
A difficult choice awaits you\..\..\..
Your squad is waiting for you.\.
Kenchiru and Rita should be near 
the teleport by now.
dialogs_chapter_5_На связи ударный батал:
The strike battalion of combat reapers is in touch\..\..\..
more precisely\..\..\..
We need help. Urgently. We have dozens of 
wounded, only a few are combat-ready.
dialogs_chapter_5_В вашу сторону идут дв:
Two large detachments are coming in your direction.\.
Commander Ricard with a group of punitive forces and 
Werolomger Laurita with battle reapers. \.
Hold out until they arrive.
dialogs_chapter_5_Локация недоступна в д: The location is not available in this version.
dialogs_chapter_5_Но пока что это все! С: But that's all for now! Save and see you soon.
dialogs_chapter_5_О! Ещё одна живая душа:
Wow! Another living soul\..\..\..
Who are you, friend?
dialogs_chapter_5_Рури... Да... Сын Сидр:
Ruri\..\..\.. Yes\..\..\..
Son of Sidrin, a battle reaper who gained recognition after
First Adamant War.
dialogs_chapter_5_И теперь его потомок и:
And now his descendant is following the same path.\.
Am I right, or did you end up here by accident?
dialogs_chapter_5_От части да... Но к че:
Partly yes\..\..\..
But why such questions?
dialogs_chapter_5_Все, кроме моих сотова:
Everyone except my corps comrades is busy with important things.
I rarely get to talk to someone just like that.
dialogs_chapter_5_Жнец. Без ранга. Видиш:
Reaper. No rank.
You see, for those who could not prove themselves at least in the most ordinary
assignments, such as escorting souls from the World of the Living to ours, are deprived
of the rank of lesser reaper.
dialogs_chapter_5_А дальше - смерть от р: And then - death at the hands of punitive forces?
dialogs_chapter_5_Нет-нет-нет. Они убива:
No no no. They only kill those who cause harm.
For people like me there is a special corps - scavengers.
dialogs_chapter_5_Унижение? Нет, я благо:
Humiliation? No, I'm grateful that even for someone like me
they found a place in Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_5_ *М: *The scavenger swung and cut off the dead man's hand*
dialogs_chapter_5_ *После этого мусорщ: *The scavenger then put the severed limb in the box*
dialogs_chapter_5_Задача каждого мусорщи:
The task of every scavenger is to come to the place where the 
reaper’s corpse lies, and by any means bring it back to Purgatory.\.
You can do it whole, you can do it in boxes.
dialogs_chapter_5_Второй вариант лучше,: The second option is better, because it is easier to heal the amputation.
dialogs_chapter_5_Что не пойдёт на лечен:
What is not used for treatment will be recycled.
From the flesh of the fallen reaper they will create a new body with a new soul.
dialogs_chapter_5_ *С: *With the following blows the scavenger cut off both legs*
dialogs_chapter_5_Если оставлять тела ва:
If you leave bodies lying around, then someone will either eat them,
or take them for personal use.\.
Still, dead organic matter is a valuable resource, and unlike
human bodies, it does not rot.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот как Чистилище подд:
This is how Purgatory maintains its numbers despite
huge losses\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Броню и снаряжение ты: Do you also take the armor and equipment with you?
dialogs_chapter_5_Конечно! Наши консервн:
Of course! Our tin cans are not needed by anyone except ourselves,
and creating dozens of sets of new armor is very
resource consuming.
dialogs_chapter_5_ *М: *The scavenger put the reaper's body in the box*
dialogs_chapter_5_Слушай\\..\\..\\.. Мне: Listen\..\..\.. I need help with something.
dialogs_chapter_5_С чем тебе помочь?: What can I help you with?
dialogs_chapter_5_На противоположной сто:
On the opposite side there are many corpses of our
brethren, but I am not strong enough to get there.
dialogs_chapter_5_Почему? Ты же до этого: Why? You somehow managed before this.
dialogs_chapter_5_Раньше мне не мешали о:
Ravagers didn't bother me before.
I could have avoided them, but now\..\..\.. there are too many of them.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тут буквально нескольк:
There are literally a few meters here, it won't take
a lot of time. Just help me get to the bodies,
if we're lucky, no fight.
dialogs_chapter_5_Показывай, куда тебе н: Show me where you need to go.
dialogs_chapter_5_Прости, у меня важное: Sorry, I have an important task.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты передумал? Хочешь п:
You changed your mind?
Do you want to help?
dialogs_chapter_5_Начиная от сюда и до с:
Starting from here to the very edge, the scanner shows
a huge number of goals.\.
It looks like they've burrowed underground and are waiting for prey.
dialogs_chapter_5_Что? Как они здесь ока: What? How did they get here?
Must. But they don't have to.
dialogs_chapter_5_Все постройки жнецов,:
All the buildings of the reapers, wherever they were, were 
attacked. There are no safe places left for us in these
surroundings.
dialogs_chapter_5_Много у моего корпуса: My corps will have a lot of work\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Пошли.\\. Нужно успеть: Let's go.\. We need to be in time before the Corpse Eater appears.
dialogs_chapter_5_Смертоносное для всех:
A monster deadly to all reapers.
This is a huge creature that does not hesitate to attack outposts,
or large groups. No matter how many reapers, 10\..\..\.. 30\..\..\.. 70\..\..\..
The Devourer will kill everyone if there is no Werolomger among the squad.
dialogs_chapter_5_П-понял. И много таких:
I-got it.
Are there many of these walking around the canyon?
dialogs_chapter_5_Каньон разбит на 4 обл:
The canyon is divided into 4 regions - the southern region, the northern,
western, eastern\..\..\.. on each 1-2.
In general, there are about 4-8 of them throughout the entire canyon.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если нарвёмся, будь го:
If we run into them, be ready to run to the teleport,
I'll think of something.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо, тогда можно я:
Okay, then can I make a copy of your ID?
And tell me the number of the car where to deliver your remains.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебе, я смотрю помощь,: I see you don't really need help...
dialogs_chapter_5_Ну так позволь ему бит:
Well, let him fight in the forefront.
If he’s so smart, then let him figure it out himself.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты про Восставших не з: Have you forgotten about the Risen?
dialogs_chapter_5_Что ж, начнем. Аккурат:
Well, let's begin. Carefully and slowly, we approach the bodies,
I sort them out and move on.
dialogs_chapter_5_И острожно! Не спровоц:
And be careful! Don't provoke sleeping arachnoids; if anything 
happens, I won't be able to help in the battle. Any Rivalser is 
stronger than me.
Okay, I can handle it myself. Just hide and don't attract attention.
dialogs_chapter_5_А?! Это ты?!\\.Коельта:
And it's you?!\.
Koeltan, where have you gone?\.
And what happened to Avel?
dialogs_chapter_5_Меня словно отключили:
It was like I was switched off for a moment\..\..\..
Everything went dark.
dialogs_chapter_5_Пока не могу сказать,: I can’t say yet, I don’t even have any guesses.
dialogs_chapter_5_Стоит спросить об этом: It is worth asking Irey about this if possible.
dialogs_chapter_5_Это - то самое место,: This is the place, the unexplored area.
dialogs_chapter_5_На картах она помечена:
On the maps it is marked as Garganthrids\..\..\..
or the Fog, as the Rivalsers call this place.
dialogs_chapter_5_Сколько отрядов сюда н:
No matter how many detachments were sent here, no one 
returned.
dialogs_chapter_5_Даже Рикард приказал к:
Even Rickard ordered the punishers to stay away from the Fog
away.
dialogs_chapter_5_Именно.\\.Только высше:
Exactly.\.
Only the supreme reaper can fight the local inhabitants.
dialogs_chapter_5_Так что, соберём павши: So, let's gather the fallen and get out of here.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Лучше прийти сюда без:
(It's better to come here without Avel. It's hard to make sure
he doesn't get killed, and fight the devastators.)
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот же ж блин\\..\\..\: Well damn\..\..\.. back in the dungeon.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как не крути, нам прид: No matter how you look at it, we'll have to go down there.
dialogs_chapter_5_Слушай\\..\\..\\.. а м:
Listen\..\..\.. maybe we can look for bodies somewhere 
else?
dialogs_chapter_5_Увы, нет.\\.Я получил:
Unfortunately no.\.
I received orders to collect bodies only in this place.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если боишься, можешь о: If you're afraid, you can stay outside.
dialogs_chapter_5_Надеюсь, дальше ты сам: I hope you can handle the rest on your own.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ладно. Удачи тебе, Рио:
Okay. Good luck, Riom.\.
And thanks for the help.
dialogs_chapter_5_Слышал от медиков у те:
I heard from doctors that you have a defect in the biceps 
area.
dialogs_chapter_5_Даже не узнаешь, что я: Don't even know what I want to offer?
dialogs_chapter_5_И что же ты хочешь пре: So what do you want to offer?
dialogs_chapter_5_: *Avel takes two pairs of hands out of the box*
dialogs_chapter_5_Смотри, эти руки прина:
Look, these hands belonged to the punisher\..\..\..
and these to the battle reaper.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я могу помочь заменить:
I can help replace your deformed arms
with workers and efficient ones.
dialogs_chapter_5_Отрублю, только аккура:
I’ll chop them off, just carefully.\.
Don't worry, it won't hurt.\.
I'll quickly do everything and fix your arms with the help of\..\..\..
ingots of life.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Коельтан, если что-то:
(Koeltan, if anything goes wrong, kill him personally.
Will this not be too difficult for you?)
dialogs_chapter_5_(Ха-ха-ха! Та без проб: (Ha ha ha! No problem. I’m really interested in what will come of it.)
dialogs_chapter_5_Руки карателя (+10 к а: Punisher's Hands (+10 attack; +5% chance of passive counterattack)
dialogs_chapter_5_Руки боевого жнеца (+1: Hands of the Battle Reaper (+15 defense; +5% crit chance)
Give me the hands of the punisher.
dialogs_chapter_5_Замени на руки боевого: Replace with the arms of a battle reaper.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тише-тише, ты сейчас в: Hush, hush, now you will attract all the living creatures from the area.
dialogs_chapter_5_ *Риом поп: *Riom tried to move his hands. Strained with all his might*
dialogs_chapter_5_Нужно выбираться отсюд: We need to get out of here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Всё таки передумал. По: You changed your mind after all. Let's go.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты словно зомби шёл к: You were walking towards that mineral like a zombie.
Zombie, you say\..\..\..
Wait. I don't remember this at all.
dialogs_chapter_5_Благодарю, Риом.\\.Ты:
Thank you, Riom.\.
You saved me just in time.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот он, источник всех: This is the source of all our problems...
dialogs_chapter_5_Хоть это и микро крист:
Although it is a microcrystal, the effect of radiation
is quite powerfull.
dialogs_chapter_5_У меня есть предложени: I have a proposal - let's blow it up.
dialogs_chapter_5_СТОЙ!!! НЕТ-НЕТ, УБЕРИ: STOP!!! NO NO, TAKE IT AWAY!
dialogs_chapter_5_Кристаллы Адаманта, ка:
Adamantium crystals tend to be bonded to each other
and if we blow up one, we'll blow up the rest, and then we 
will blow up along with the cave.
All that will be left after us is a crater!
dialogs_chapter_5_Если большой бабах не:
If big bang isn't an option, then you'll have to
bypass with protection.
dialogs_chapter_5_Воспользуйся магически:
Use the magic barrier
and go around the edge of the crystal.
dialogs_chapter_5_И не перепутай с магич:
And don't confuse it with a magic ingot,
otherwise the explosion will be even more violent.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Понял-понял, спасибо: (Got it, got it, thanks for the hint.)
dialogs_chapter_5_По сути да.\\.Они пере:
Basically, yes.\.
They transfer the limbs directly to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_5_Кстати, если вдруг теб:
By the way, if you suddenly need to teleport,
then\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Я могу тебя поместить:
I can put you in a box, and then they will return you
arms\..\..\.. and legs.
dialogs_chapter_5_Интересно ты придумал,:
It's interesting what you came up with, maybe you can show it yourself,
without arms and legs?
dialogs_chapter_5_Прости-прости\\..\\..\:
Sorry, sorry\..\..\.. I didn’t mean to offend you.
Just a suggestion.
dialogs_chapter_5_: *The Reapers turned to Riom and drew their weapons*
dialogs_chapter_5_Наконец-то хоть кто-то:
Finally, at least someone is more or less whole.\.
What is your name?
Nice to meet you, Riom.
I am Volf, commander of the battle reapers.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как видишь, нам срочно:
As you can see, we urgently need help.
More than half of the reapers are seriously wounded, and ingots
of healing are running out.
dialogs_chapter_5_И как это случилось?\\:
And how did this happen?\.
Were you not warned that the Ravagers, along with
with the Risens destroyed our army?
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом\\..\\..\\.. Мы и:
Riom\..\..\.. We are that battalion\..\..\..
What's left of it\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Для начала нам нужен д:
First, we need a strong enough medic,
to heal as many fighters as possible.
dialogs_chapter_5_После этого - запастис:
After this, stock up on life ingots, we will
need at least 30 of them.
dialogs_chapter_5_Дальше нужно будет ого:
Next it will be necessary to fence off the wounded with protective
barrier.
dialogs_chapter_5_Отряду потребуется вре:
The squad will need time to recover,
and it is possible that it will be necessary to fight off
devastators.
dialogs_chapter_5_После этого мы сможем:
After this we can move towards
South Canyon, where we'll join 
the rest of the squads.
dialogs_chapter_5_К сожалению, да.\\.Мно:
Unfortunately yes.\.
Many are crippled so badly that the healing
power of Hydrite will not be enough.
dialogs_chapter_5_Поэтому, сам решай в к: Therefore, decide for yourself in what order and what to do.
dialogs_chapter_5_Сам я не могу с тобой:
I myself cannot go with you.\.
One of my warriors will help you instead of me.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хе-хе. Быстро ты смени:
Hehe. You quickly changed your profession.\.
Former punisher Gasp.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, пожалуйста\\..\\:
Riom, please\..\..\..
I was just following orders.
dialogs_chapter_5_Всех, кого ты на пару:
Rickard redirected everyone you and Rita knocked out
to the corps of combat reapers to Lady
Laurita.
dialogs_chapter_5_Пока что поверю.\\.Дел:
I’ll believe it for now.\.
Do what I say and help in battles.
I'll cover you, and you'll cover me. Agreed?
dialogs_chapter_5_(Коельтан, поглядывай:
(Koeltan, keep your eyes on him.
If you smell Gasp's bloodlust directed at me,
warn me. I'll blow his head off faster than
he can draw his sword.)
dialogs_chapter_5_Это то что я хотел усл:
That's what I wanted to hear. Don't worry, I'll warn you.
At worst, I'll behead him myself.
dialogs_chapter_5_Госпожа Лаурита! Након: Lady Laurita! Finally you have arrived.
dialogs_chapter_5_Благодаря Риому мы смо:
Thanks to Riom, we were able to
hold out long enough.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если бы не те 30 слитк:
If it weren't for those 30 ingots\..\..\..
Did we even survive\..\..\..
Lady Laurita\..\..\.. Praise of Death\..\..\..
We already thought we were finished.
dialogs_chapter_5_Это все\\..\\..\\.. Та:
That's all\..\..\.. So little\..\..\..
Out of three hundred.
dialogs_chapter_5_Простите. Тогда на пол:
Sorry.
Then we were taken by surprise on the battlefield\..\..\..
Reconnaissance spotted only the Risens
in the veil of fog.
dialogs_chapter_5_Командир Вольф, успоко:
Commander Volf, calm down.
We can no longer help the fallen\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Главное, что хоть кто-: The main thing is that at least someone survived.
dialogs_chapter_5_Все, кто может, перене: Everyone who can, move the dead here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как закончите, помогит: When you're done, help Rita with the wounded.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я вызову подкрепление:
I'll call for reinforcements and then we'll decide
what to do next.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, нужно будет разо:
Riom, we will need to deal with the protective barrier.
Take one of the reapers with you, if necessary.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо, посмотрю, что: Okay, I'll see what I can do.
dialogs_chapter_5_Кого взять с собой? В:
Who should I take with me? It won't be easy to activate
the barrier alone.
dialogs_chapter_5_Лаурита, мне понадобит:
Laurita, I need your help with
activation of the barrier.
dialogs_chapter_5_Рита, присмотри за ран:
Rita, look after the wounded and don't
lean out.
dialogs_chapter_5_Рита, сколько времени:
Rita, how long will it take you to treat
the wounded? I could really use a good
medic in the group.
dialogs_chapter_5_Да, Риом? Что-то хотел: Yes, Riom? Did you want something?
dialogs_chapter_5_Хотел о кое-чем погово: I wanted to talk about something.
dialogs_chapter_5_Расскажи о своем оружи: Tell me about your artifact weapon.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как тебе служба под на: How do you like serving under my father?
dialogs_chapter_5_Расскажи о той девушке: Tell me about that girl, despite our argument.
dialogs_chapter_5_Кенчиру, расскажи о св:
Kenchiru, tell me about your artifact.
I never fully understood what he was like.
dialogs_chapter_5_О нет, Риом, последнее: Oh no, Riom, the last thing she would want\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Сплетни о себе, раскры: Is gossip about herself, revealing secrets.
But this is an ordinary sword.
dialogs_chapter_5_Правда? Ты её не видиш: Is it true? Don't you see her? This is good.
dialogs_chapter_5_Во время нашего боя, к:
During our fight, when you hit me\..\..\..
like a fog, I began to hit worse.
It’s like my blows are being pulled aside by someone.
dialogs_chapter_5_Верно мыслишь, но это:
You think correctly, but that’s not all.
None of my opponents will see the artifact,
but they will feel the full consequences of the blow.
dialogs_chapter_5_Пожалуй, больше не мог:
I guess I can’t say more\..\..\..
She's starting to get angry.
dialogs_chapter_5_Интересно, призрачный: Interesting, a ghostly sword with a female incarnation\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, даже не пытайся:
Riom, don't even try to hit on her,
you're definitely not her type.
dialogs_chapter_5_Он балансирует между с: He balances between severity and softness.
dialogs_chapter_5_Порой его поручения, и:
Sometimes his instructions, or orders, are as easy
as pie to do, and sometimes he is ready to make sacrifices
in order to fulfill the order of the mistress Death.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мне доверили собирать:
I was entrusted with collecting information about everything 
the devastators are doing and what they have done.
dialogs_chapter_5_Эти сведения будут рас:
This information will be considered by the highest reapers
once the matter with the Risen is closed.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда война закончится:
When the war is over, the Werolombers will decide what to do
with Vlur-Stig and his creations.
dialogs_chapter_5_А до этого мне и разве:
And before that, the scouts and I need to monitor
the situation and not lose sight of another
stab in the back.
I believe that you can handle it.
dialogs_chapter_5_Слушай, Кенчиру, насчё:
Listen, Kenchiru, about that noblewoman
with red hair\..\..\..
Tell me about her, despite our bet.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не терпится с ней поза: Can't wait to have some fun with her?
dialogs_chapter_5_Раз так хочешь, без пр: If that's what you want, no problem.
dialogs_chapter_5_ *Кен: *Kenchiru took out a holographic tablet from his pocket.*
dialogs_chapter_5_Венрика. Аристократка:
Venrika. An aristocrat at the court of Heinrich von Witzlach.
Very talented in martial arts.
Flexible, slim build, medium size
chest and hips.
dialogs_chapter_5_Скромная, застенчива,:
Modest, shy, avoids talking about
obscenity or vulgarity.
dialogs_chapter_5_Возможно девственница,: Possibly a virgin, I haven't checked.
dialogs_chapter_5_А как же характер, бол:
What about character, more personal qualities, hobbies
and something more useful?
dialogs_chapter_5_Это ты сам узнаешь, ко: You will find out for yourself when you meet her.
dialogs_chapter_5_Расскажи о своем артеф: Tell me about your artifact. What kind of sword is this?
dialogs_chapter_5_Шверт фон Один. Меч ль:
Schwert von Odin. Sword of ice and indestructible steel.
A weapon that do not tolerate manifestations of fear,
uncertainty and panic from the owner.
dialogs_chapter_5_Оно поощряет увереннос:
It encourages confidence, willpower and remaining
cool in the most dangerous situations.
dialogs_chapter_5_Очень не просто добить:
It's not easy to get submission from such a sword,
being a mid-ranking reaper. This thing rejected 
ne several times and did not allow me to use it's
magic until I forced it to submit.
dialogs_chapter_5_И как ты его заставила:
And how did you make him obey?
Yelled at the sword?
dialogs_chapter_5_Сразилась, пару десято:
I fought a couple of dozen times, sometimes I won,
sometimes I lost. Continued to challenge until
Odin broke.\.
Mentally.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, даже не думай. Я:
Riom, don't even think about it. I'll kill you if you
get on my nerves.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Нет-нет... Даже не ду: (No, no... I didn't even think about it.)
dialogs_chapter_5_Не ври, я прекрасно сл: Don’t lie, I can hear your thoughts and intentions perfectly.
dialogs_chapter_5_Лаурита, а как ты лади:
Laurita, how do you get along with Odin?
Does he also periodically whisper things in your ear?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я что, похож на куртиз:
Do I look like a courtesan to whisper something in 
someone's ear in a gentle voice?
dialogs_chapter_5_Вполне. Я ему рассказы:
Quite well. I tell him about my dreams,\.
what’s in my soul, \.dreams and fantasies...
dialogs_chapter_5_Господи, Дьявол, Смерт:
Lord, Devil, Death, thank you that Laurita is not
my owner...
dialogs_chapter_5_А у тебя с твоим духом: Do you have problems with your spirit?
dialogs_chapter_5_Он часто комментирует:
He often comments on everything that happens,
gives advice incomprehensibly...
dialogs_chapter_5_Я тебе сейчас кое-что: I'll give you something else now!
dialogs_chapter_5_Постарайся искать комп:
Try to seek a compromise. The desires of the spirit and
the owner rarely coincide. So talk to him,
take his opinion into account when you do something.
And never\..\..\.. never anger him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Душа живущая в клинке,:
The soul living in the blade is usually stronger than 
any reaper. Our strength directly depends on the 
willingness of weapons to share it. The more you trust 
each other, the better it will be for you.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Вот бы нам с тобой та: (If only you and I could get along like this...)
dialogs_chapter_5_Не беси меня и всё воз: Don't piss me off and anything is possible.
dialogs_chapter_5_Расскажи легенду о Пер: Tell the legend of the First Reaper Pelagius.

Tell the legend of the First Reaper Pelagius.
Is the situation favorable for this now?
dialogs_chapter_5_Да\\..\\..\\.. Сейчас-: Yes\..\..\.. Now we are definitely in no danger.
dialogs_chapter_5_И так, когда-то давно:
And so, once upon a time, a certain entity that 
controlled the balance of the flow of souls from the 
world of the Living, wished to create a tomb for herself.
dialogs_chapter_5_Крепость, которая по к:
A fortress that in beauty and grandeur would stand
on par with Paradise, the city of Hierarchs and Hell, 
a lava prison for sinful souls.
dialogs_chapter_5_Сама Смерть не могла и:
Death herself could not and did not know how to build
such complex structures.
dialogs_chapter_5_Из куска своего тела С:
From a piece of her body, Death decided to create 
a creature similar to human, but different in everything.
dialogs_chapter_5_Жнеца. Исполнителя вол:
The Reaper. The executor of the will of Death and 
the one who is capable of creating no worse than 
the Hierarchs, the servants of the Creator of everything.
dialogs_chapter_5_Первый жнец получил им: The first reaper received the name Pelagius.
dialogs_chapter_5_А так же первое поруче:
And also the first order - to find a way to create
Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_5_И Пелагий искал, заодн: And Pelagius searched, at the same time learning about the worlds of the Dead and the Living.
dialogs_chapter_5_От мира Живых он позна:
From the world of the Living he learned the essence of life and death,
as phenomena. Love and hate for your creations.
Creation and destruction.
dialogs_chapter_5_От мира Мертвых Пелаги:
From the world of the Dead, Pelagius learned the truth about how
the world actually works, about the Creator, the Devil and other
inhabitants of our world.
dialogs_chapter_5_Поиск знаний привел Пе:
The search for knowledge led Pelagius to minerals 
that radiate energy. All that remains is to choose 
the place where Purgatory will be located.
dialogs_chapter_5_Долго Пелагий искал ме: For a long time Pelagius looked for a place. He even visited Hell.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не успел он решиться,: Before he could make up his mind, the First Cataclysm began.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ужасное бедствие, во в:
A terrible disaster, during which monsters of unprecedented
power burst out from the Abyss. 12 Judges went on
a bloody campaign through every world except the Living.
dialogs_chapter_5_Настолько они сильны,:
They are so strong that they could kill Death
in her physical form, destroy half of Hell
and Paradise and God himself.
dialogs_chapter_5_Пелагий тоже попал под:
Pelagius also came under attack from one of the judges -
Nightmare. The Reaper was lucky that the enemy was weakened,
therefore Pelagius continued to fulfill his goal.
dialogs_chapter_5_В спешке он нашёл огро:
In his haste, he found a huge green, brightly glowing
stone. This was another source of energy that Pelagius
had not seen until this moment. Adamant.
dialogs_chapter_5_Принеся в жертву всё,:
Having sacrificed everything that the reaper had, he 
built Purgatory at the cost of his life. Adamant 
became the main source of energy for buildings.
dialogs_chapter_5_Так и начался этот кош: That's how this night\..\..\.. horror began.
Kind of weird\..\..\..
The war with the Risens began because the first 
among the reapers created a fortress by borrowing 
some energy from their shrine.
dialogs_chapter_5_А теперь нам всё это д:
And now we have to sort this whole thing out.
Pelagius, unfortunately, did not foresee such an outcome.
dialogs_chapter_5_Держи, 30 слитков, как: Here you go, 30 ingots, as you asked.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я очень благодарн тебе:
I am very grateful to you, Riom.
I knew I could count on you!
dialogs_chapter_5_Спасибо! Это сильно ус:
Thank you! This will greatly speed up the treatment of the wounded.
We can be on our way in a couple of minutes.
dialogs_chapter_5_Благодарю, Риом! Тепер:
Thank you, Riom!
Now we can hold out until help arrives.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я жду от тебя слитков,: I'm waiting for ingots from you, Riom.
dialogs_chapter_5_Надеюсь, ты сможешь на:
I hope you can find a good medic for my squad, 
Riom.
dialogs_chapter_5_Штаб. Это Риом Рури, к: Headquarters. This is Riom Ruri, do you hear?
dialogs_chapter_5_Слышим тебя отлично. С: We can hear you perfectly. What can I help with?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я нахожусь недалеко от:
I'm not far from the place where there was a battle between 
the Battle Reapers and the Rebe... with the devastators.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тут много раненых.\\.Н:
There are a lot of wounded here.\.
We need the help of a reaper with healing skills.\.
Is there anyone you can refer to me?
dialogs_chapter_5_Судя по координатам, в:
Judging by the coordinates, you are not far from Lady Laurita.
There is someone with her who will help you.
dialogs_chapter_5_И как далеко она от ме: And how far is she from me?
dialogs_chapter_5_Довольно близко, на юг: Quite close, southwest of the camp.
Got it, I'm already moving out.
dialogs_chapter_5_Боевой жнец никак не р:
The battle reaper doesn't react at all. His gaze is cold and empty. Both hands are cut off. 
On the left side there are fragments of a sword sticking out in the neck and back.
dialogs_chapter_5_Они не принадлежат меч: They do not belong to the sword of the devastator.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не успел Риом среагиро:
Before Riom could react, the battle reaper fell dead
right on his arm.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тело жнеца наполовину:
The reaper's body is half chopped, the throat is almost completely
fragmented.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом быстро выхватил с: Riom quickly grabbed the life ingot from his pocket.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом закрыл глаза павш: Riom closed the eyes of the fallen reaper.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда мы одолеем Восст:
When we defeat the Risens, next in line will be
devastators.
dialogs_chapter_5_Потом Чистилище и оста:
Then Purgatory will remind the rest of the world's 
inhabitants about the old sins.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не знаю по какой причи:
I don't know why devastators united 
with the Risens\..\..\.. We need to break
their union.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тогда опустошители не:
Then the devastators will not interfere with us and
there will be much fewer losses among the reapers\..\..\..
When it's all over, the Werolomgers will be able 
to form an alliance with Vlur-Stig.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хоть ненадолго мы смож:
At least for a little while we can live in peace.
The Devastators could even become ours
allies\..\..\.. or at least they won’t
kill the reapers.
dialogs_chapter_5_Монстры они или нет, В:
Monsters or not, Vlur-Stig can pacify them. 
We just need to find out the reason for their
hatred towards us.
dialogs_chapter_5_Дело конечно твое, но:
Of course, it's up to you, but I would
advise you to focus on our main enemy.
dialogs_chapter_5_Леди Лаурита! Посмотри: Lady Laurita! Look at the top!
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот черт! Все, бегом з: Damn it! Everyone, run after me!
dialogs_chapter_5_Отступайте к телепорту: Retreat to the teleporter! Rita, lead the squad to Purgatory!
dialogs_chapter_5_Плохо дело. Риом, нужн:
This is bad. Riom, we need to hide away 
from the roads for a while. A giant flock
is coming towards us.
dialogs_chapter_5_А я не собираюсь трати:
And I'm not going to waste my energy
in vain.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я как раз вижу одно не: I just see one good place.
dialogs_chapter_5_Такое укрытие подойдет: Is this kind of shelter suitable?
dialogs_chapter_5_Лучше переждать пока с: It's better to wait until the flock of devastators scatter.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда локатор покажет:
When the locator shows minimal activity
of locals, we can go further.
This will last a long time\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_(Коельтан, ты можешь с:
(Koeltan, you can somehow use your spiritual aura
to divert the devastators' attention away from us?)
dialogs_chapter_5_Если магической энерги:
If there is enough magical energy, then no problem.
Is an hour enough for you two?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я сконцентрировал тьму:
I concentrated the darkness of the Genome on your cloak.
This will take less energy. Then think for yourself
how to use it.
dialogs_chapter_5_И учти два факта. Вы в:
And consider two facts.
You are in an extremely inconvenient and dangerous place, and also\..\..\..
I hear all your thoughts and observe.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мой плащ может полност:
My cloak can completely hide the presence of the one
whom it shelters. Right now it's just me.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я могу укрыть тебя и т:
I can cover you and then the devastators won't
be able to feel the two of us. What do you say?
dialogs_chapter_5_Ни один жнец в Чистили:
Not a single reaper in Purgatory was as weird as you.
I saw different manifestations of character.
But for something like this\..\..\..
Every time you surprise more and more.
dialogs_chapter_5_Знаешь, я очень сильно:
You know, I was very surprised when Sidrin
and Bella decided\..\..\.. to have a child.
They knew that the reapers' bodies were incapable
of reproduction.
dialogs_chapter_5_Но он хитрый мужик и п:
But he is a cunning man and came up with the idea
to use his military merits to create you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Это было крайне рисков:
It was an extremely risky decision.
I was afraid that the lady would execute Sidrin
for such a request right on the spot.
dialogs_chapter_5_Почему он вообще пожел: Why did he even want this?
dialogs_chapter_5_Твоя мать его об этом: Your mother asked him about it.
dialogs_chapter_5_Она и сама наполовину: She's half a reaper herself. So are you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как так получилось? Я:
How did this happen? I thought only for me
Lady Death made an exception.
dialogs_chapter_5_Да. О тебе всё Чистили:
Yes. All of Purgatory knows about you, but Bella Ruri's
becoming a reaper is a secret for all of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тут Сидрин решил своев:
Here Sidrin decided to be willful.
I'm afraid\..\..\.. I don't know the whole story, and
I don’t want to give away the secrets of my best friend.
Even to you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Сам спросишь, когда ве: Ask him yourself when you return.
dialogs_chapter_5_Да уж\\..\\..\\.. Отец: Yeah\..\..\.. Father is playing with fire.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ха-ха-ха, точно, но и:
Ha-ha-ha, exactly, but you’re no better.
You and him are like two peas in a pod in breaking
rules and laws.
Still, be careful. If headquarters decides that you
pose a threat to Purgatory, they will get rid of you.
It doesn't matter how strong you are. If necessary,
Death will personally come for your soul\..\..\.. literally.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо, буду осторожен: Okay, I'll be as careful as I can.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хм\\..\\..\\.. Опустош:
Hmm\..\..\.. There are fewer and fewer devastators
on the radar. Do you want to talk about something else
while we still have time?
It's time for us to move out.
dialogs_chapter_5_Отлично, мы уже близко:
Great, we're close! All we need to do is
bypass the Dark Forest and...
dialogs_chapter_5_И дальше вы никуда про: And then you will go nowhere.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хотите покинуть наши з:
You want to leave our lands without even thanking us for
hospitality? And we tried so hard with our Creator...
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты ещё кто такой? Собр: And who are you? Linker's fellow?
Sorry for being rude.
My name is Garth Salem, the mouth and voice of Vlur-Stig.
dialogs_chapter_5_Линкер был его руками,:
The Linker was his hands, a warrior capable
communicate his thoughts through brute force.
dialogs_chapter_5_Что тебе нужно от нас?: What do you need from us?
dialogs_chapter_5_“Нас”? Нет. Вы двое ме: Us? No. I'm not interested in you two.
dialogs_chapter_5_Гарт указал пальцем на: Garth pointed his finger at Rita and Kenchiru.
dialogs_chapter_5_Значит я тебе нужен. И: So you need me. And for what?
dialogs_chapter_5_Мой владыка хочет побе:
My lord wants to talk to you
eye to eye.
dialogs_chapter_5_Гильрах или “Король”,:
Gilrach or "King" as you called him,is just
a connecting link in the nervous system of all sentient
devastators. He doesn't make important decisions.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебя хочет видеть влад: The ruler of all my brothers wants to see you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо. Сначала скажи,:
Okay. First, tell me why you
united with the Risens? They used you
in the First Adamant War as meat
to strike Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я не вправе разбалтыва:
I have no right to blab the truth of the lord.
Let's just say you reapers were the first to shed our blood on our
ground and refused to hand over the culprit to be torn to pieces
by Vlur-Stig.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот как\\..\\..\\.. Ве: That's how\..\..\.. Lead me to Vlur-Stig.
dialogs_chapter_5_Конечно, но есть одна: Of course, but there is one small problem.
dialogs_chapter_5_Кенчиру положил руку н: Kenchiru placed his hand on the hilt of his sword.
No, my lady\..\..\.. You
misinterpreted my words.
dialogs_chapter_5_Зачем тебе это?! Если:
Why do you need this?! If your lord
wants to solve problems peacefully, then why should you
fight?!
dialogs_chapter_5_Первое. Я не говорил,:
First. I didn't say that Vlur-Stig
wishes for a peaceful solution to the conflict.
dialogs_chapter_5_Второе. Это моё личное:
Second. This is my personal desire. You will be
unnecessary at the audience.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вспомните и посчитайте:
Remember and count how many of my
brothers you have slaughtered up to this point.
dialogs_chapter_5_Почему\\..\\..\\.. Я н:
Why\..\..\.. I hoped that at least
one of you is adequate...
dialogs_chapter_5_Владыка... Желает виде: The Lord... Wants to see you three.
dialogs_chapter_5_Гарт выставил указател: Garth stuck his index finger forward.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ещё давно. Очень опром:
A long time ago. Very reckless of you
to shine your spiritual energy so much.
dialogs_chapter_5_Странно. Первый раз ви:
It's strange. This is the first time I've seen a reaper who can sense
my presence. Interesting\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Если хочешь поговорить:
If you want to talk, stop showing off,
jump down and come closer.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вижу, ты умнее своих с:
I see that you are smarter than your relatives.
What is your name?
dialogs_chapter_5_Гарт Салем, уста и гол: Garth Salem, the mouth and voice of Vlur-Stig.
dialogs_chapter_5_Лаурита, Вероломгер ил: Laurita, Werolomger or High Reaper, whichever you prefer.
dialogs_chapter_5_Его зовут Риом Рури, с:
His name is Riom Ruri, son of the Werolomger Sidrin Ruri,
and my valiant bodyguard.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мой владыка Влур-Стиг:
My lord Vlur-Stig wishes to see Riom Ruri
for an audience.
dialogs_chapter_5_Но за те\\..\\..\\.. в: But he didn't say anything about\..\..\.. you\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Правда? Не лучше ли и: Is it true? Wouldn't it be better for me to join this conversation?
dialogs_chapter_5_В моих полномочиях при:
I have the authority to make decisions for Purgatory,
and I can settle all our differences.
Just let me get to your lord on the carpet.
dialogs_chapter_5_Даже не знаю\\..\\..\\:
I don’t even know\..\..\.. I have no right to make such
decisions and contradict the will of Vlur-Stig.
He said to bring only Riom to him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хм\\..\\..\\.. И что ж:
Hmm\..\..\.. And what do you intend to do?
Do you want to attack me?
dialogs_chapter_5_Не советую. Не хотелос:
I don't recommend it. I wouldn't want such
a smart devastator to unexpectedly slam into 
the ground right down to the dungeon.
dialogs_chapter_5_Гарт, ты ведь умнее св: Garth, you're smarter than your relatives, aren't you?
P-perhaps\..\..\.. Vlur-Stig can reconsider his order.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я перенесу вас двоих к: I'll take you two to him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Продолжение следует. В:
To be continued.
You can teleport to Vlur-Stig's laboratory through
the global map when the chapter is available.
dialogs_chapter_5_Всё. Каюк ей.\\. С так:
That's it. She's screwed.\. With such wounds she
will last for 5-10 minutes. Or for as long as the reaper's
willpower allows. Not much anyway.
dialogs_chapter_5_Рита, держись, сейчас: Rita, hold on, now I will help you.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Нужно найти других па:
(I need to find other fallen reapers and take away
from them the body part that Rita is missing.)
dialogs_chapter_5_(А после вернуться к д: (And then return to the girl and heal.)
dialogs_chapter_5_И у тебя на всё 5 мину: And you have 5 minutes for everything.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебе удалось остановит: You managed to stop the bleeding.
dialogs_chapter_5_Спасибо\\..\\..\\.. Бо: Thank you\..\..\.. Thank you very much, Riom!
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом аккуратно и нежно: Riom hugged Rita carefully and tenderly.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не бойся, я не брошу т: Don't be afraid, I won't leave you in trouble.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я думала, что всё\\..\: I thought that everything\..\..\.. was over for me.
dialogs_chapter_5_Моя душа отправится в:
My soul will go to the abyss, my name is
crossed off from all lists, the body will go to
processing and I will disappear\..\..\.. without return.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вместе мы справимся, ч: Together we will cope, no matter what happens.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я прикрою тебя, а ты м: I'll cover you, and you'll cover me.
dialogs_chapter_5_Да\\..\\..\\.. Только:
Yes\..\..\.. But it wouldn't hurt to
look around. It's too dark in here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот же гадство, почти:
This is disgusting, almost all the insides
fell out.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом находит слиток жи: Riom finds the Life Ingot in his pocket.
dialogs_chapter_5_Лицо восстановилось то: The face has only partially recovered. Missing eyes...
dialogs_chapter_5_Нужно одолжить у мертв: You need to borrow the dead reaper's left arm.
You need to borrow the dead reaper's right arm.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ещё чуть-чуть и сможеш: Just a little more and you will be able to walk.
dialogs_chapter_5_Нужно одолжить у мертв: You need to borrow the dead reaper's left leg.
You need to borrow the dead reaper's right leg.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты пока отдохни, а я в:
You just rest for now, and I'll restore everything
else.
dialogs_chapter_5_Нужно одолжить у мертв: You need to borrow the dead reaper's eyes.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты отрубил павшему жне:
You cut off the left arm of a fallen reaper.
There's nothing more to take from him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Знаешь, как заживлять:
Do you know how to heal torn
limbs?
dialogs_chapter_5_Д-да! Оторванную часть:
Y-yes! Attach the torn part to
it's place, and heal with an ingot of life.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты отрубил павшему жне:
You cut off the right arm of a fallen reaper.
There are no other limbs left.
dialogs_chapter_5_Держись Рита... Ещё не: Hang in there Rita... Just a little more...
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты отрубил павшему жне:
You cut off the left leg of a fallen reaper.
That's all he had.
dialogs_chapter_5_Спи спокойно и не держ: Sleep well and don't hold a grudge against me.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты отрубил павшему жне: You cut off the right leg of a fallen reaper.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вроде девушка\\..\\..\:
Looks like a girl\..\..\.. Damn.
Okay equipment, but taking body parts is somehow
unusual.
dialogs_chapter_5_Привыкай, всё бывает в: Get used to it, there is a first time for everything.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом аккуратно с точно:
Riom carefully, with the precision of a surgeon, gouged out 
the fallen reaper eyes.
dialogs_chapter_5_Остановимся здесь нена:
We'll stop here for a while. I need to fix
equipment.
dialogs_chapter_5_Пожалуй, не тебе одной: Perhaps you are not the only one.
dialogs_chapter_5_И так, процесс запущен: And so, the process has started.
dialogs_chapter_5_У тебя есть мечта? Как:
Do you have a dream?
Any purpose in life other than serving
Lady Death?
dialogs_chapter_5_Трудно назвать это меч: It's hard to call it a dream... More like a desire.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я хочу выжить в этой в:
I want to survive this war with the Risens
and leave the post as commander of the 
medical corps.
dialogs_chapter_5_А после отправиться на:
And then go to gather and escort souls to 
the world of humans. With healing skills,
I will be able to help other units.
dialogs_chapter_5_Так от меня будет хоть:
This I will be of at least some use
without risking... my life.
dialogs_chapter_5_А дальше? Хочешь целую:
And then? Do you want to do routine work
for all eternity?
dialogs_chapter_5_Почему бы нет?.. Я не:
Why not?..
I'm not as strong as you, Laurita and many
others.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как насчёт тебя? Чего: What about you? What do you want?
dialogs_chapter_5_Тоже чего и ты. Выжить:
The same as you. Survive and find a way to end 
the war without a bloody meat grinder between
reapers and the Risens.
dialogs_chapter_5_Всё мои мечты - пробле: All my dreams are problems of today.
dialogs_chapter_5_Для начало нужно с ним:
First we need to deal with them,
and then I’ll find for myself what I want.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот как. Интересно, чт:
That's it. I wonder what you want,
when it's all over...
dialogs_chapter_5_Как именно суккуб обуч: How exactly did the succubus teach you healing magic?
dialogs_chapter_5_Если я помогу утолить:
If I help satisfy her hunger,
then she will share her strength.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я подумала, что она хо:
I thought she wanted to find
a sinful soul and eat it... literally.
dialogs_chapter_5_Но потом... когда двер:
But then... when the door slammed right in front
me, I realized she meant something completely 
different.
Як саме суккуб навчила тебе: Y-yes... You yourself know what succubi are known for.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты тоже с ней спал?: Did you sleep with her too?
dialogs_chapter_5_В тот момент я благода:
At that moment I thanked Death, The Creator 
and the Devil that I was not born human.
Otherwise that night would have been my last.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ага... Я тоже, хотя не:
Yeah... Me too, although I'm not sure
does this apply to girls...
dialogs_chapter_5_Рита прикрыла лицо рук: Rita covered her face with her hands.
dialogs_chapter_5_Почему мы вообще это о: Why are we even discussing this?!
We've been sitting too long. It's time to look for a way out.
dialogs_chapter_5_Наконец-то я вас нашёл: Finally I found you! Riom, Rita, is everything okay?
dialogs_chapter_5_В целом... да. Выкараб: In general, yes. We got out.
dialogs_chapter_5_Долго рассказывать, Ке:
It's a long story, Kenchiru.
First, let's get to the reaper camp in South
Canyon, we'll talk there.
dialogs_chapter_5_Слышала, ты запрашивал:
I heard you requested support from the medical corps.\.
Are we late?
dialogs_chapter_5_Пока что нет.\\.Ранены:
Not yet.\.
The wounded I spoke of are not far from here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Только будьте осторожн:
Just be careful, there are giant devastators
roaming these labyrinths.
dialogs_chapter_5_Лорды\\..\\..\\..Да, н:
Lords\..\..\..
Yes, they can cause a lot of problems.
dialogs_chapter_5_Кенчиру, ты что здесь: Kenchiru, what are you doing here?
dialogs_chapter_5_Лаурита, как обстоят д: Laurita, how are things in Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_5_Как видишь, задание вы:
As you can see, I’m completing the task.
Your father ordered to collect as much information
as possible information about the situation.
dialogs_chapter_5_В идеале бы найти в эт:
Ideally we would find the Risens in this area
with a piece of Adamant itself.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ирей близок к тому, чт: Irey is close to finding their habitat.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тут недалеко есть поле:
There is a battlefield not far away, and there I saw several
bodies of Adamant's minions.
dialogs_chapter_5_Отличная новость. Нужн:
Great news.
We should definitely take a look at them.
dialogs_chapter_5_Получена дополнительна:
Additional objective obtained: Inspect the bodies of 
the Risens along with Kenchiru.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо, как будет возм:
Okay, as soon as we have the opportunity, we’ll examine the 
bodies.
dialogs_chapter_5_Готовитесь к контрудар: Are you preparing for a counterattack?
dialogs_chapter_5_Конечно.\\.Чтобы они н:
Certainly.\.
Whatever they plan, we need to destroy them before
they take the next step.
dialogs_chapter_5_Очень странно, что Вос:
It is very strange that the Risens made an alliance 
with those who they used in the last war as 
disposable striking fist.
dialogs_chapter_5_Клавдий тогда поработи: Claudius then enslaved many local inhabitants.
dialogs_chapter_5_По здравой логике, они:
According to common logic, they should also be both
against us and against the Risens.
dialogs_chapter_5_Глупое решение принял: The King made a stupid decision...
dialogs_chapter_5_Да, это тот, кто их ве:
Yes, this is the one who leads them.
Consider him the center of the nervous system.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я его не видел в списк:
I didn’t see him on the lists of punishers\..\..\..
What is he known for among the reapers?
You didn’t just give him a nickname, did you?
dialogs_chapter_5_Надо как-то его называ:
We need to call him something, but the word “King” 
excellently fits his behavior.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если хочешь, можешь на:
You can call him 'Leader' if you want.
The point won't change.
dialogs_chapter_5_Давно не виделись, Рит:
Long time no see, Rita.
Did you miss me?
dialogs_chapter_5_Как сказать.\\..\\.. Д:
How to say.\..\.. I don’t even know.\..\..
I'm glad you're alive and okay.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебя ранили? Травмиров:
Were you wounded? Injured?
Where? Show me!
dialogs_chapter_5_ Рит: Rita with the scanner began to examine Riom.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом слегка придержал: Riom lightly held Rita's shoulders and gently moved her away from him.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мне плохо в ментальном:
I feel bad mentally.\..\..
Just a couple of hours ago I was thinking how to get some sleep
at Irei’s lecture.\..\.. And now I’m thinking about how not to die
while following Rickard's orders.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как правильно поступит: How to deal correctly with the Risens and devastators.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как быть с моим призра:
How to deal with my ghostly friend in my head.
It is unknown what he will do in the near future.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебя из жизни, если бу: End your life if you make me angry.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я очень хочу помочь те: I really want to help you.\..\.. I just don’t know how.
dialogs_chapter_5_Так что, если тебя что:
So if you need anything, just tell me.
I'll try to help as much as I can.
dialogs_chapter_5_Пока что, мне достаточ:
For now, your support is enough for me.
Thanks for listening.
dialogs_chapter_5_Всё в полном порядке,:
Everything is fine, honestly.
Do not worry about me.
dialogs_chapter_5_: Rita looked at you in disbelief.
dialogs_chapter_5_Лаурита, как там дела: Laurita, how are things in Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_5_Бывало лучше. Ряды все:
It used to be better. The ranks of all the corps have 
thinned out greatly. The garrison of combat reapers 
is hardly enough to protect Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если Восставшие вновь:
If the Risens decide to attack us again with numberical
advantage.\..\.. Lady Death will join the battle with her
bodyguards and the Three Great Outcasts.
This is our last line of defense.
dialogs_chapter_5_Насколько сильны телох:
How strong are bodyguards, and why are they needed?
And the three Outcasts.\..\..Who are they?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я далеко не всё знаю о: I don’t know everything about our mistress...
dialogs_chapter_5_Телохранители - это те:
Bodyguards are the same High Reapers, that is,
Werolomgers, like me.
But they do not command any corps.
dialogs_chapter_5_Вся свита Смерти никог:
The entire retinue of Death never leaves the walls
of her tomb.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как и Великие Изгои. О:
So are the Great Outcasts.
They are completely guarding the only entrance to her chambers.
dialogs_chapter_5_Великие Изгои - что-то:
The Great Outcasts are something like Cerberus, they are not 
reapers, not demons or even angels.\..\..
Their bodies are made from one of the most durable materials -
Tyranite.
dialogs_chapter_5_Больше я ничего не мог: I can't say anything more about them.
dialogs_chapter_5_Смерть кого-то боится?: Is Death afraid of anyone? Why does she need security?
dialogs_chapter_5_А ты не помнишь легенд: Don’t you remember the legend of the First Reaper Pelagius?
dialogs_chapter_5_Ох.\\..\\.. Как-нибудь:
Oh.\..\.. Someday I’ll remind you of it.\..\..
Believe me, in our world there are those whom even 
Death is wary of.
dialogs_chapter_5_Леди Лаурита, всё гото:
Lady Laurita, everything is ready.
We just have to hold out until the arrival of
reinforcements.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, занимай позицию:
Riom, take position and get ready to
greet guests. Large pack of devastators
is coming towards us. As soon as we kill all
Lords, they will run away!
dialogs_chapter_5_Пора раскошелиться на:
It's time to fork out for all the explosive
ingots... While the barrier is intact...
dialogs_chapter_5_Выберите кого оставить: Choose who to leave out of battle.
dialogs_chapter_5_Бойцы, хорошая новость:
Fighters, good news. They're retreating!
Part of the flock underground... those on
higher ground. They're all leaving!
dialogs_chapter_5_Интересно, почему они: I wonder why they weakened their onslaught?
dialogs_chapter_5_Долго вы шли\\..\\..\\: You walked for a long time\..\..\.. You missed this...
dialogs_chapter_5_Простите нас, леди Лау:
Forgive us, Lady Laurita.
Along the way we encountered numerous
groups of devastators. We had to try
to save as many fighters as possible.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ладно, то что вы дошли:
Okay, it’s already a miracle that you got here.
We need to move towards the South Canyon.
The other reapers have been waiting for us\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, как будешь готов:
Riom, when you're ready, come to me,
I’ll tell you the further plan of action.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хорошо, сейчас... Толь: Okay, now... I'll just take a little rest.
dialogs_chapter_5_Одному будет не просто:
It won't be easy for one to fight off
a whole group... Who should I ask for help?..
dialogs_chapter_5_Не повезло им\\..\\..\:
Unlucky for them\..\..\..
It's strange that there weren't any bodies this time.
dialogs_chapter_5_Опустошители обычно ос:
Devastators usually left behind the bodies of fallen reapers,
and now they have decided to devour everyone.
dialogs_chapter_5_Либо у них в поле зрен:
Either they had a tasty target in sight,
or they were simply not allowed to eat.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хм. Снова вниз? В подз: Hm. Down again? To the dungeons?
dialogs_chapter_5_Одному туда спускаться:
It's very dangerous to go down there alone. I can
get lost, waste a lot of time for nothing\..\..\..
What if I need help from another artifact
owner?
dialogs_chapter_5_Нет. Лучше дождусь под:
No. I'd rather wait for help from Purgatory, it's better
with them than alone.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Гасп хоть и помогает,:
(Although Gasp helps, he does not have unique
abilities. Who knows how it will turn out below?\..\..)
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот же мрази\\..\\..\\:
They're such scum\..\..\..
According to my reports, this is already the 20th\..\..\..
or the 30th guard point\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Сомневаюсь, эти твари:
I doubt these creatures have ever spared anyone.
It's interesting that they decided to take the bodies of the fallen
reapers with them.
dialogs_chapter_5_У кого-то сегодня буде:
Someone is going to have a hearty meal today.
Which is very bad for us.
dialogs_chapter_5_Они восстанавливаются:
They recover and become fierce when they are full,
but if, on the contrary, they are hungry\..\..\.. that’s even worse.
dialogs_chapter_5_Впадают в бешенство на:
They go berserk just like that.
You don't even need to hit them.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не думаю, что это проб: I don't think it's a problem since Lady Laurita is with us.
dialogs_chapter_5_Подожди, Лаурита. Ещё:
Wait, Laurita. It's too early.
We need to take a better look around the area.
dialogs_chapter_5_Надеюсь, хоть кто-то у: I hope at least someone survived.
dialogs_chapter_5_Стоит осматриваться по:
It's worth looking around.
I wouldn't want to run into the creatures that did
all this.
dialogs_chapter_5_Так. Нам придется спус:
Okay. We'll have to go downstairs to fix the barrier. 
Or at least find out what's wrong with it.
dialogs_chapter_5_Странно вроде всё обес:
It’s strange that everything seems to be de-energized, but the 
elevator is functioning\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_В этом нет ничего удив:
There is nothing surprising.
It's mechanical.
dialogs_chapter_5_Это мера предосторожно:
This is a precautionary measure, just for
our case.
dialogs_chapter_5_К чему нам готовиться?:
What should we prepare for? I heard from Ilnara that
there are plenty of these creatures underground. 
Especially the wild ones\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Разумные опустошители:
Sentient devastators rarely go underground.
Just because of their maddened brethren.
dialogs_chapter_5_Да\\..\\..\\.. Одичалы:
Yes\..\..\..
Wild devastators are more dangerous than their sapient
relatives.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, Кенчиру. Будьте:
Riom, Kenchiru. Be extremely careful.
I won't be able to use Schwert von Odin at full strength
in the dungeon.
dialogs_chapter_5_Здесь разгуливают опус:
There are devastators walking around here that you won't meet
on a surface.
dialogs_chapter_5_К несчастью, Влур-Стиг:
Unfortunately, Vlur-Stig was very fond of experimenting
by interbreeding different life forms with demonic blood.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мне плевать какая твар:
I don’t care what creature decides to attack me.
But I'm afraid for you.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не волнуйся, до сюда я: Don't worry, I somehow got here alone.
dialogs_chapter_5_Постараюсь не рисковат: I'll try not to take risks.
dialogs_chapter_5_М-мне нестрашно. Я-я с:
I-I'm not afraid. I-I'm a servant of Death, like you and Kenchiru,
why should I be afraid?
dialogs_chapter_5_Мы справимся, верь в н: We can handle it, believe in us.
dialogs_chapter_5_На этом посту находили:
At this post there were combat reapers and their task
was\..\..\.. to guard the northern underground channel
from wild devastators.
dialogs_chapter_5_Проход в подземелье бы:
The passage to the dungeon was urgently closed
after a group of scouts discovered a giant flock. 
As soon as communication with the group
was lost, the door was quickly blocked.
dialogs_chapter_5_Такая себе мера защиты:
So-so measure of protection.
Although the door weighs ten tons and is so thick that
even a devourer cannot penetrate it, it can be bypassed.
This is part of the serpentines.
dialogs_chapter_5_А дальше - сломать бар:
And then - break the barrier.
Unfortunately for those who held the defense, the barriers
outside Purgatory are very weak. A huge flock can easily
destroy them.
Yes, but\..\..\..
There are almost no corpses and the devastators are nowhere 
to be seen.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не похоже, чтобы они п:
It doesn't look like they've broken through the defenses from 
the outside.
dialogs_chapter_5_Странно. У него нигде: Strange. There are no visible wounds anywhere\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_ *Кенчиру: *Kenchiru carefully lifts the head of the fallen reaper.*
dialogs_chapter_5_Какого черта?! Что с н: What the heck?! What's wrong with him?!
dialogs_chapter_5_Позвоночник. Редко так:
Spine. It's rare to see such a creature.
This devastator is looking for corpses, and when it finds them,
it bites into the back and takes control of the body,
at the same time increasing physical strength to the limit.
Don't underestimate it.
This is a very vile and dangerous creature.
dialogs_chapter_5_Он\\..\\..\\.. мертв,:
He\..\..\.. is dead, but not completely.
As if someone was controlling him.
This is the first time I've seen something like this.
dialogs_chapter_5_Зря мы его не добили\\: It’s a shame we didn’t finish him off\..\..\..
Now watch your backs.
The spine likes to attack from behind.
dialogs_chapter_5_И нам пора бы запустит:
And it's time for us to start the power supply,
there should be a lever somewhere here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Слышал от разведчиков:
I heard from scouts about such a creature\..\..\..
But taking control of the fallen reapers.
dialogs_chapter_5_Зачем Влур-Стигу нужны: Why did Vlur-Stig need such monsters?
dialogs_chapter_5_Кто знает. Он вроде ка:
Who knows. He seemed to be doing experiments first,
and then created normal devastators.
I mean “sapient.”
dialogs_chapter_5_Здесь должен быть рыча:
There should be a lever here. With it we will launch
power supply.
dialogs_chapter_5_И будьте на чеку. Неиз:
And be on alert. It's unknown where this monster
will jump out at us.
dialogs_chapter_5_Подача питания есть. О:
There is power supply. All that remains is to activate
the barrier itself.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Осталось активировать:
(It remains to activate the second lever
for the barrier to work.)
dialogs_chapter_5_(Слишком рано. Нужно з:
(Too early. We need to start the power supply
on the barrier.)
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, ты ведь не забыл:
Riom, you didn’t forget about the lever, did you?
We need to start the power supply.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хм\\..\\..\\.. Куда ты:
Hmm\..\..\..Where are you going so fast?
You came here to activate the barrier.
Don't forget the lever at the back.
dialogs_chapter_5_Подожди. Мы забыли про:
Wait. We forgot about the lever.
Without power supply, the barrier is useless.
dialogs_chapter_5_Стой-стой. Рычаг. Ты з:
Wait, wait. Lever. Have you forgotten?
The power supply needs to be turned on.
dialogs_chapter_5_Есть! Барьер активиров: Yes! The barrier is activated, it's time to get out of here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мы переправимся через:
We will cross the stone bridge, carefully 
walk past the devastators and
head towards the South Canyon and
reunite with the other reapers there.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если по пути с нами ни:
If nothing happens to us along the way,
then the plan will be successful.
Otherwise, we will give battle to devastators.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты с остальными бойцам:
You and the rest of the fighters will take on 
the small ones, and I will take on the largest creatures.
dialogs_chapter_5_Будет не просто, но я: It won't be easy, but I will help in any way I can.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как будешь готов, подо:
When you are ready, come to me.
I'll prepare the squad to leave.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, подожди! В этой:
Riom, wait! There are still bodies of the fallen reapera
in this area. We need to examine everything more carefully.
dialogs_chapter_5_Хочешь оставит мусорщи: Do you want to leave the scavenger alone in the caves?
dialogs_chapter_5_Подожди, Риом! Сначала:
Wait, Riom! First we need to get 
to the wounded reapers, and only then
we'll prepare a shelter for them.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты же ради этого нас п: This is why you called us.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебя посещали мысли, к: Have you had thoughts like my mother?
Before you answer\..\..\..
Let me give you one story as an example.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда-то давно, до вой:
Once upon a time, before the war with the Risens and
devastators, Purgatory had a different enemy.
dialogs_chapter_5_Стражи и особо опасные:
Guardians and especially dangerous creatures of the hybrid
origin.
dialogs_chapter_5_Стражи любили красть д:
The Guardians loved to steal souls from the world of the Living.
They knew how to wedge themselves into the flow of souls and 
take away up to a dozen souls. Each guard had his own motive
for doing this.
dialogs_chapter_5_Особо опасные индивиды:
Particularly dangerous individuals posed a threat to anyone
who approached them, with the exception for their own\..\..\..
But they fought each other.
dialogs_chapter_5_Обычные жнецы могли уб:
Ordinary reapers could save a few souls,
but not the entire world of the Living.
There will hardly be 500 thousand of us,
but himans are born and die in millions.
dialogs_chapter_5_Поэтому Высшие жнецы р:
Therefore, the High Reapers decided to eliminate 
the threat at it's roots. And they started hunting for 
wandering exiles. Why do you think they were named
"guardians"?
dialogs_chapter_5_Они всегда что-то охра: They are always guarding something. Am I right?
dialogs_chapter_5_Да, свою территорию. О:
Yes, their territory.
They serve no one, they have no deities,
they are thrown to the mercy of fate
and do what they want.
dialogs_chapter_5_Зачем куда-то идти, ес:
Why go somewhere if there is no reason?
So they sit in the same place.
That's why they got this definition.
dialogs_chapter_5_На ликвидацию стражей:
An entire expedition was sent to eliminate the guards.
It was an army of six battalions.
Three punitive and three combat.
dialogs_chapter_5_Возглавляли поход два:
The campaign was led by two Werolomgers - me and Rickard. 
Your father also participated in that campaign, but then he was
Rivalser, the lower reaper, and carried out mainly
reconnaissance We had a dozen targets to eliminate.
dialogs_chapter_5_Проблемы начались в пе:
The problems started in the first skirmish.
One of the guards, Riser was the first to attack and
with one volley of chain lightning, he smashed an entire squad 
to the ground. There wasn't even anything to collect there.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мы слишком недооценива:
We underestimated these bastards too much.
Can you imagine how strong they are?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я думаю что этот проти:
I think this opponent is beyond the strength
of a simple reaper.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мягко сказано. Отряд и:
To put it mildly. A squad of 50 punitive or
combat reapers for them are one tooth apart.
At a minimum, a High Reaper is needed here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мы все это быстро поня:
We all quickly realized this. I explained the situation
headquarters, and my battalion was recalled.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ага\\..\\..\\.. Всё чт:
Yeah\..\..\.. All that’s left after a couple of fights.
Sidrin and I stayed.
dialogs_chapter_5_У него очень странная:
He has a very strange way of fighting. He sent
the detachment attacked the guard head-on, and he 
himself struck in the back. Each time it cost many lives,
in exchange for one victory.
dialogs_chapter_5_Для него подчиненные -:
For him, his subordinates are meat.
Instead of fighting face to face, he
covered himself with punitive forces like a human shield.
dialogs_chapter_5_Как думаешь сколько ка: How many punishers do you think survived?
dialogs_chapter_5_Один единственный - Ри:
There was only one - Rickard. He himself separated
from us and was stuck for a couple of months in the
underground sector of the canyon.
dialogs_chapter_5_Он вернулся, но сильно:
He's back, but he's changed a lot.
His speech became even more cynical, harsher and
with notes of sadism.
dialogs_chapter_5_Рикард смог оправдать:
Rickard was able to justify every lost squad.
As a result of the expedition, we destroyed 9 out of 10 guards.
Riser is lucky to survive.
dialogs_chapter_5_Получается ты с отцом:
It turns out that you and your father hate Rickard because
he spared no effort and lives of his fighters to achive
victory?
dialogs_chapter_5_За то что он делал это:
Because he did this where there were unnecessary 
sacrifices could have been avoided. Rick doesn't 
even try to look for other ways.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда-нибудь ты в этом: Someday you will see this for yourself.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я никогда не желала то:
I never wanted the same thing.
Why should I take care of a child?
I do not need it.
dialogs_chapter_5_Не конкретно это. Я сп:
Not this specifically. I'm asking about desires
that are unique to humans.
dialogs_chapter_5_Тяжело сказать, что из:
It's hard to say which of my desires are
the result of personal development, 
and which are unique to humans.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я прожила уже больше т:
I have lived for more than a thousand years.
The only thing that torments me is loneliness.
dialogs_chapter_5_Когда есть возможность:
When you have the opportunity to get to know someone better,
why not do it?
dialogs_chapter_5_Я хорошо знакома со вс:
I am well acquainted with the entire headquarters of the 
Werolomgers, I know almost every stone under Purgatory\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Большое спасибо госпож:
Many thanks to the lady for the decision to create
reapers with limitations of personality and emotions.
dialogs_chapter_5_Если бы не они, то я б:
If it weren't for them, I would go crazy from this
long life.
dialogs_chapter_5_Ты хорошо разбавляешь:
You are a good addition to my company.
Don't mind listening to my thoughts.
dialogs_chapter_5_В какой-то мере моё же:
To some extent, my wish has been fulfilled.
The rest is up to you\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебя сюда по приказу о: Were you sent here by order, or did you volunteer?
You look tense. Are you afraid?
dialogs_chapter_5_Тебя сюда по приказу о:
Were you sent here by order, or did you volunteer yourself?
The northern part is quite a dangerous place\..\..\..
First of all, I'm not afraid.
There are no safe places in our world, and there are places
scarier than the canyon.
dialogs_chapter_5_Во-вторых, вызвалась я:
Secondly, I volunteered on my own,
because there is no one better than me among the doctors\..\..\..
except your mom.
dialogs_chapter_5_Какими бы мощными не б:
No matter how powerful the reapers are, without good
support, they will not survive in such a dangerous environment.
dialogs_chapter_5_И даже слитки им не по: And even ingots won't help them?
dialogs_chapter_5_Целительные расходники:
Healing consumables still need time to be used,
and they will end sooner or later.
dialogs_chapter_5_Я же говорила, что не:
I told you I don't want to be useless
at a crucial moment?
dialogs_chapter_5_Вот этот момент и наст:
This moment has come.
For this I have trained and studied all my life.
dialogs_chapter_5_Есть немного\\..\\..\\:
A little\..\..\..
These monsters are damn strong, especially the big packs.
dialogs_chapter_5_Пока с нами леди Лаури:
As long as Lady Laurita is with us, we can cope with any threat.
She is very strong, and with her artifact, devastators
will completely bypass us.
dialogs_chapter_5_Эти существа чувствуют:
These beings sense the level of her spiritual energy
and will stay as far away as possible\..\..\..
or they will only attack in huge flocks.
dialogs_chapter_5_(Коельтан, что-то они:
(Koeltan, for some reason they are not particularly afraid of you.
Any ideas why?)
dialogs_chapter_5_Во-первых, ты ещё недо: First of all, you haven't mastered Genom yet.
dialogs_chapter_5_А во-вторых, я предпоч:
And secondly, I prefer not to shine spiritual energy 
left and right. This may scare away devastators, 
but will attract the attention of a more terrible enemy.
dialogs_chapter_5_Стражей, изгнанников,:
Guardians, exiles, wandering demons\..\..\..
Someone who is stronger than devastators or the Risens.
dialogs_chapter_5_Лаурита знает про риск:
Does Laurita know about risks? She is not afraid to attract
the attention of someone more powerful than devastators?
dialogs_chapter_5_Возможно, но я верю, ч:
Perhaps, but I believe that she will defeat anyone,
who lives in the jagged canyon. So don't worry.
dialogs_chapter_5_Можешь отменить наш ко:
Can you cancel our contract? What if I'm under someone's
I will give away your secrets under control. I wouldn't want to die
so stupidly.
dialogs_chapter_5_ *Рита подвела указате: *Rita brought her index finger to her mouth. Hinting Riom to remain silent.*
dialogs_chapter_5_Как только смогу тебе:
As soon as I can trust you completely,
I’ll cancel it right away.
dialogs_chapter_5_И что мне нужно для эт: And what do I need to do for this?
dialogs_chapter_5_(полушёпотом) Достаточ:
(in a half-whisper) It will be enough if you
keep it a secret until the very end, when we
deal with the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_5_Обещаю, что никому не:
I promise I won't tell anyone your secrets 
until the very end.
dialogs_chapter_5_Прости, Риом\\..\\..\\:
Sorry, Riom\..\..\..
I don't trust verbal promises.
dialogs_chapter_5_Черт\\..\\..\\.. Ну де:
Damn\..\..\.. Well, wilds. Koeltan, the source of the threat is far 
from us?
dialogs_chapter_5_Нет, Риом, он совсем р: No, Riom, he is very close. Sniffs you.
Evaluates\..\..\.. Walk around a little and sooner or later he will 
attack, and then act quickly. This freak is with the punishers for 
a reason blacklisted.
dialogs_chapter_5_Это список особенных к: Is this a list of special clients?
dialogs_chapter_5_Да, тех на кого просто:
Yes, those for whom a simple punisher or a combat reaper is not
will be sent.
dialogs_chapter_5_Летуны\\..\\..\\.. А э:
Flyers\..\..\.. And this one is also fierce, like a Linker\..\..\.. 
Combination speed and strength\..\..\.. Now it’s clear why 
they couldn’t kill him someone of my rank.
dialogs_chapter_5_Риом, ты еле дышишь. У: Riom, you can barely breathe. Calm down and heal.
dialogs_chapter_5_Мне там делать больше: I have nothing else to do there.
dialogs_chapter_5_Гаргантриды, или Туман: Garganthrids, or Mist, as the Rivalsers called it.
dialogs_chapter_5_Но никто не запрещал т: But no one forbade you to come here.
dialogs_chapter_5_Кто знает как тебя наг:
Who knows how you will be rewarded if you defeat the one 
who is here dwells.
dialogs_chapter_5_Дальше вас ждет опасно:
Next a dangerous test awaits you. Go back to it
ending is impossible. Are you sure you want to continue?
